abstract: The tariff, which will start at 35 percent this month, is a victory for the United Steelworkers union, a crucial ally in President Obama’s health care overhaul.
snippet: The tariff, which will start at 35 percent this month, is a victory for the United Steelworkers union, a crucial ally in President Obama’s health care overhaul.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  In a break with the trade policies of his predecessor, President Obama announced on Friday night that he would impose a 35 percent tariff on automobile and light-truck tires imported from China.

headline.main: U.S. Adds Tariffs on Chinese Tires
headline.print_headline: U.S. Will Add Tariffs on Tires Made in China
